name: Phantasmagoria
description: This installer will extract the game data from the windows installer from GOG.com

files.installer:
N/A:Select the GOG.com game setup file (setup_phantasmagoria_*.exe). Download it here: 
https://www.gog.com/downloads/phantasmagoria/en1installer0
https://www.gog.com/downloads/phantasmagoria/en1installer1

content:
files:
- installer: "N/A:Select the GOG.com game setup file (setup_phantasmagoria_*.exe).\
    \ Download it here: \nhttps://www.gog.com/downloads/phantasmagoria/en1installer0\n\
    https://www.gog.com/downloads/phantasmagoria/en1installer1\n"
- fileextract: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  game_id: phantasmagoria
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting innoextract application
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $fileextract
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE/game" "$installer"
    description: Extracting game data
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/game
scummvm:
  aspect: true
  fullscreen: true
  gfx-mode: 3x
system:
  reset_desktop: true
